author: lordofdragonss
title: I am a boy but...
review:
This was my first Belvile set! It was the cheapest with many cool accessories in
I love taking care of baby and rebuild this room.

There are some rare accessories in this set:
-Two Teddy bears (one in unicq light blue color)
-two bottles for baby
-cotton pillow and bed for baby(like DUPLO one, but fit as well)
-blue shovel
Pros
Nice room Design
2Bears and bottles
Cute lego bricks
just three stickers

Cons
Weird shape of plate
hmmm.. better walls?

Note: 4.5/5

author: hustla187
title: Love Me Don't
review: Lego was smart by releasing Belville to attract female builders, but this doesn't impress me. It is just a nursery and it comes with a mother and a baby. There is nothing good about this set and gets a 1 for that reason.
